First Public Beta Release, Required for use with Graffik 1.024
Fixed shots/hr estimate resetting bug. Fixed MUP functionality. Added dynamic updating of dist/hr when shots/hr is adjusted.
Fixed value bounding bugs in shots and distance estimator tools. Fixed memory reset bug.

Added EZ mode. Added dynamic voltage compensation to maintain motor speed. Improved speed / distance calculation accuracy. Added units indicators. Added distance/hr and shots/hr estimators. Added setting of speed by percent power. Changed nomenclature for "Rising" and "Falling" to "Ending" and "Beginning". Changed nomenclature of "Cold Mode" to "NVD Auto-Off". Added pause function for aux I/O. Added setting of each speed decimal place. All motors are enabled by default after factory reset.

Added a motor ramping to prevent tripping the battery when starting the program and during direction changes. Added I/O mode that allows the user to stop the motors but have the camera continue shooting.
Added timer, fixed ramp and lead in issues, fixed I/O debouncing, reduced the problem of tripping the battery when reversing direction.

Change the manual move to allow for a hold to move option and changed the speed increments. Fixed the errors occuring with the Aux I/O. Change the root menu so that if the user is currently on a motor screen and hits select they will jump to the root menu of that motor instead of the main root menu.

Added VFD dimming menu. Fixed flickers in cursor on various screens. Added menu wrapping in both directions. Now saves motor speed/distance settings. Added time delay in motor direction reversely to prevent over drawing power from battery pack.
Fixed flicker in VFD screen. Fix camera exposure time so it's updated in the interval time.
Fixed Ramping Bug. Changed how cold weather mod works.
Save States Added.
SMS Bug Fix.
First Production Release
